WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing this for MOP.  If we see something like this come up again, it will be a new issue.
WorkItem.Description:
Rumor has it that what EJ calls the "Masterfrost" playstyle is now the best theoretical dps for a DK.  It changes the relative value of secondary stats, so at least reforging would look very different (if not actual gear choices?).  Any chance it could be modeled in Rawr?
Â 
http://elitistjerks.com/f72/t125291-frost_dps_winter_discontent_4_3_a/#Masterfrost

Comments.Message: I'll take a look at building a specific master frost style rotation.
Ok... I got some basics to the rotation in my dev build.   It needs some clean-up then I get it checked in.  Maybe available for next release.
